required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Safety, Absorption and Metabolism of SYHA1402 Tablets in Healthy People
clinical_study.official_title: Single-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single Dose Ascending Trial of SYHA1402 Tablets in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock:
The trial used single-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single-dose study.
The trial planned to enroll sixty-two healthy volunteers. The subjects were allocated to seven dose groups, including 25 mg (4+2), 50 mg (8+2), 100 mg (8+2), 200 mg (8+2), 400 mg (8+2), 800 mg (6+2) and 1200 mg (6+2). Each dose group was allocated test drugs and placebos according to the proportion of subjects in the brackets mentioned above.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change of systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure
primary_outcome.description: To assess the change of blood pressure after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of heart rate after administration of SYHA1402
To assess pulse after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of body temperature after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of 12-lead ECG (PR，QRS，QT，QTc) after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of physical examination (including cardiovascular system, chest and lung, abdomen, nervous system, skeletal muscle system, etc) after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of blood biochemistry (including LDL, HDL,TC, ALT, AST, etc) after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of blood routine after administration of SYHA1402
To assess the change of urinary routine after administration of SYHA1402

secondary_outcome.description: Plasma peak concentration (Cmax) after administration of SYHA1402
Plasma peak time (Tmax) after administration of SYHA1402

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC0-72h)
secondary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve of SYHA1402 after administration are calculated.
The half time of SYHA1402 after administration are calculated.
To assess the apparent clearance (CL/F) after administration of SYHA1402

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportional dose-response relationship between pharmacokinetic parameters Cmax and AUC of SYHA1402
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the Proportional dose-response relationship between pharmacokinetic parameters Cmax and AUC of SYHA1402

facility.name: The General Hospital of the People's Liberation Army
